name: Cradle of Persia
description: Build the mysterious heart of Ancient Persia in this engaging puzzle game! The original capital of the Achaemenid Empire was adorned with luxurious metals, gems and stone carvings, sure to have impressed peasants and visiting nobles alike.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1000 MHz CPUMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: 32 MB Video CardDirectX®: 8
